name: Flower Power - LD46
description:
Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam. 

You are taking a leisurely stroll through a flowery forest when you come across a flower monster, Tulip, stuck in a hole.  Tulip needs to eat colored flowers to stay alive.  Can you pluck and feed them to Tulip fast enough?

Controls:

  • WASD or Controller - Movement
  • Space/Click/Fire - Pluck flower or feed Tulip

There is no end to this game.  The goal is to see how long you can last before Tulip passes out from lack of nutrition.

Jam Notes

My goal with this Ludum Dare was to create a game my kids could have fun playing.  This game was intended to be easy to play, fun to look at and silly.  I hope it makes you smile.

Tools used: Unity, ZBrush, Unity, Substance Designer, Photoshop, Audacity, FL Studio
